mapper.sql: alarm_id, user_id, user_name, project_id, project_name, detection_id, smu_cms_id, sensor_id, alarm_type_id, alarm_context, create_time, status, alarm_level, frequency
mapper.select: select a.*, al.*, sd.item_name 'alarm_type' from alarm a, alarm_linkman al, sys_dictionary sd where a.create_time >= date_sub(now(), INTERVAL 10 MINUTE) and a.create_time < now() and a.project_id = al.project_id and a.alarm_type_id = sd.dic_id and a.status = 20 and al.status = 27

select
from alarm where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and status = 20 order by create_time desc

select a.*, sd.item_name 'alarm_type', dp.detection_name 'detection_name' from alarm a, sys_dictionary sd, detection_point dp where a.project_Id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and a.alarm_type_id = sd.dic_id and a.detection_id = dp.detection_point_id

select a.*, sd.item_name 'alarm_type', dp.detection_name 'detection_name' from alarm a, sys_dictionary sd, detection_point dp where a.project_Id = ${_parameter.projectId} and a.alarm_type_id = sd.dic_id and a.detection_id = dp.detection_point_id order by a.create_time desc
mapper.insert: insert into alarm (alarm_id, user_id, user_name, project_id, project_name, detection_id, smu_cms_id, sensor_id, alarm_type_id, alarm_context, create_time, status, alarm_level, frequency) values (#{alarmId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{detectionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{smuCmsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sensorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{alarmTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{alarmContext,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{alarmLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{frequency,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into alarm
alarm_id,
user_id,
user_name,
project_id,
project_name,
detection_id,
smu_cms_id,
sensor_id,
alarm_type_id,
alarm_context,
create_time,
status,
alarm_level,
frequency,

mapper.update:
update alarm
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
project_name = #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
detection_id = #{detectionId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
smu_cms_id = #{smuCmsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sensor_id = #{sensorId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
alarm_type_id = #{alarmTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
alarm_context = #{alarmContext,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
alarm_level = #{alarmLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
frequency = #{frequency,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where alarm_id = #{alarmId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update alarm set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, project_name = #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, detection_id = #{detectionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, smu_cms_id = #{smuCmsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sensor_id = #{sensorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, alarm_type_id = #{alarmTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, alarm_context = #{alarmContext,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, alarm_level = #{alarmLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, frequency = #{frequency,jdbcType=INTEGER} where alarm_id = #{alarmId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
